GSP29vnyps42u:2: nyā. pa. śa. 51 evaṃ tāvadvivecitaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP29vnyps42u:4: teṣveva kecit anumānasya pratyakṣentarbhāvamicchanti; kecittu aprāmāṇyam;
GSP29vnyps42u:6: tatra pūrve śabdasyānumānentarbhāvamāhuḥ; pare tu kecit antarbhāvam;
GSP29vnyps42u:7: kecidaprāmāṇyam; te cāgamaṃ ca sāṃkhyāḥ, bhūṣaṇamatānuvartinaśca /
GSP29vnyps42u:8: tatra vedasyānāditvaṃ pūrve parijagṛhuḥ; uttare tvīśvarasṛṣṭatām; tāni ca smṛtiṃ ca vaiśeṣikaikadeśinosmatsiddhāntaikadeśinaśca; tānyeva sārthāpattikāni prābhākarāḥ; anupalabdhiṣaṣṭhāni tānyeva tautātitāḥ,
GSP29vnyps42u:11: anante pūrvāparakāle kaḥ kimaṅgīkuryāt, kiṃ vā bahiṣkuryāt, iti ko jānātyanyatra kalpasākṣātkāriṇastasmādekasmāddevāt
GSP29vnyps42u:14: tatra yathā pratyabhijñādīnāṃ pratyakṣādiṣveva niveśa iṣyate,
GSP29vnyps42u:17: smṛtiranubhava ityaṃśabhedosti cet" ityāśaṅkya pratyuktaṃ śrīviṣṇucittaiḥ--- "yadi viṣayabhedaḥ, tadā aṃśabhedaḥ saṃbhavet;
GSP29vnyps42u:19: kathaṃ saṃskāraḥaparokṣadhījanakaḥ iti cet, na, cakṣurādīndriyasahakṛtasya saṃskārasya jñāturaikyāt tadidamityaparokṣadhīhetutvopapatteḥ /
GSP29vnyps42u:24: dīpe ca 'anusmṛteśca' iti sūtre bhāṣitam- "pratyabhijñānācca na paṭādeḥ kṣaṇikatvam; tadevedamiti pratyabhijñāyate; pratyabhijñā hi nāmātītavartamānakālavartyekavastuviṣayamekaṃ pratyakṣajñānam tasya kāladvayasambandhāviśiṣṭamekameva vastu viṣayaḥ /
GSP29vnyps42u:25: na ca tadityaṃśaḥ smaraṇam, idamaṃśaśca grahaṇam,
GSP29vnyps42u:26: atītasambandhinīndriyasaṃprayogābhāvāt iti vācyam, tadidamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyena grahaṇasyaikatvasphuraṇāt
GSP29vnyps42u:27: pūrvānubhavajanitasaṃskārasacivendriyasaṃprayogayuktasya puruṣasya tathā grahaṇamupapadyata eva; anvayavyatirekādhīnaṃ hi sarvatra
GSP29vnyps42u:29: anye tu atra dhībhedabāddhyaparihārau matvā tadidamaṃśayostadaṃśe saṃskārānvayavyatirekānuvidhānadarśanāt parokṣarūpatayā idamaṃśe ca patyakṣarūpatayā cobhayātmakatvamāhuḥ /
GSP29vnyps42u:33: parokṣāparokṣarūpatvam, svayaṃprakāśatvāt, sarvajñānānāṃ vedyetarāṃśāpekṣayā ca pratyakṣatvāt
GSP29vnyps42u:34: uktaṃ cedaṃ śrīviṣṇucittairapi --- "svaprakāśakaṃ viṣayaprakāśakaṃ caikameva jñānam; tatra smṛtriranubhūtiriti kuto bhedaḥ ?" iti paricodya,
GSP29vnyps42u:35: "prakāśamānabhedāt, iti brūmaḥ; yathā--- gaurayamityekasminneva jñāne prakāriprakāraviṣayabhedena jñānāṃśabhedaḥ; yathā---
GSP29vnyps42u:37: yathā ca ghaṭapaṭāvityekasminneva jñāneṃśabhedaḥ; yathā vā parābhyupagatabhramajñāneṣvadhiṣṭhānāṃśe prāmāṇyam, itaratrāprāmāṇyaṃ ca"
GSP29vnyps42u:38: iti parihārāt; tathā "smṛteḥ svaprakāśāṃśopi saṃskāramātraja eva,
GSP29vnyps42u:39: indriyādipratiniyatakāraṇāntarābhāvāt" iti paricodya "naivam, jñānānāṃ prakāśamānatvasya svābhāvikatvāt" iti parihārācca /
GSP29vnyps42u:44: nyā. pa. śa. 52 pratyabhijñāpyabhijñāvat tridhā cākṣādibhedataḥ /
GSP29vnyps42u:47: na hi liṅgādibhiḥ soyamiti jñānaṃ na jāyate //
GSP29vnyps42u:55: ekaṃ jagati naiva syāditi syāt sarvaśūnyatā //
GSP29vnyps42u:58: nyā. pa. śa. 53 pratisandhānamapyātmagocaraṃ pratyabhijñāviśeṣa eva;
GSP29vnyps42u:62: saṃvādo nāma jñānajātyantaram, iti kecit; tadayuktam,
GSP29vnyps42u:64: yattu varadaviṣṇumiśrairuktam--- "gṛhītārthaviṣayaṃ śabdakāraṇakaṃ jñānaṃ saṃvādaḥ" iti, tadapi śābdāvāntarabhede saṃjñāviśeṣaniveśamātraparam;"na
GSP29vnyps42u:66: gṛhītamātragocarapramāṇāntarepi tadanyatvaprasaṅgāt; bhavati hi parvatoyamagnimāniti śabdaśravaṇānantaraṃ dhūmaṃ parāmṛśatopi tādṛśī buddhiḥ /
GSP29vnyps42u:69: na cāpekṣāyuktaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bhedobhedo vā, tṛṇādipratyakṣasyāpi tathā prasaṅgāt" ityuktam
GSP29vnyps42u:70: kimarthaṃ tarhi vedānāṃ vedāntānāṃ cāprāptaviṣayatvaṃ samarthyate ? iti
GSP29vnyps42u:73: nyā. pa. śa. 54 upamānamapi yadi gṛhyamāṇapadārthagatasādṛśyavijñānāt
GSP29vnyps42u:75: tattadvastusaṃsthānaviśeṣādyatiriktasya sādṛśyasyābhāvāt, tasya ca pūrvadṛṣṭatvāt, smaryamāṇatvācca
GSP29vnyps42u:77: yadvā yo yatsadṛśaḥ, sa tadgatasādṛśyapratiyogī; yathā---mithaḥ svahastau,
GSP29vnyps42u:81: sā cet arthāpattiḥ, sādṛśyadhīrapi tathā kiṃ na syāt ? iti /
GSP29vnyps42u:82: athavā yugapadeva tatsadṛśoyamiti pratyayenaivobhayavṛttisādṛśyasphuraṇānna taddhetukam, anyathā pṛthaganubhūtayostadānīmapratītasādṛśyayoḥ parastādyugapat
GSP29vnyps42u:83: smaryamāṇayoryugapadeva pratīyamānasādṛyayoḥko nirvāhaḥ ?, tatrāpi vā pramāṇāntaraṃ kalpyate yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ, govad dviśapho na bhavatyaśvaḥ, dīrghagrīvaḥ pralamboṣṭho vikaṭākṛtiḥ paśuḥ kramelakaḥ, iti tu sādharmyavaidharmyadharmyamātraviṣayam /
GSP29vnyps42u:87: tacca vyutpattiphalakam" iti, tadapyanupapananam, prāgeva vyutpattisiddheḥ /
GSP29vnyps42u:90: iti, tatra nimittasyāpratītitaḥ, iti tvasiddham, gavayatvādereva jātiviśeṣasya gosādṛśyākāropalakṣitasya prathamameva vākyārthatayā pratītiḥ; gosādṛśyākāropalakṣitasya prathamameva vākyārthatayā pratītiḥ;
GSP29vnyps42u:91: gosādṛśyopalakṣitaḥ kaścid vyaktiviśeṣo gavaya iti hi pratītiḥ /
GSP29vnyps42u:92: paścāt pratyakṣitagavayasya tadvaiśadyamātrameva; uktaṃ ca śrīviṣṇucitteḥ--- "gosadṛśo gavayaḥ iti gosādṛśyaikādhikaraṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ vācyamiti vyutpannam, prathamaṃ vākyārthatayā pratīteḥ /
GSP29vnyps42u:96: evaṃ cānabhyupagame kathaminrdādiśabdavyutpattiḥ ?; na hyatra nimittabhūtasaṃsthānaviśeṣādidṛṣṭiḥ
GSP29vnyps42u:105: pramāṇadvayavirodhe sati viṣayavyavasthāpanamarthāpattiḥ, ityapi na vācyam, pramāṇayoḥ satorvirodhābhāvāt, viruddhayorapi prāmāṇyāyogāt /
GSP29vnyps42u:106: nanu devadattasya jīvane kutaścit pramāṇāt pramite, jīvatā kvacit sthātavyam, ityaviśeṣeṇa deśasāmānyasambandhāvagatau gṛhamapyāskandantyāṃ
GSP29vnyps42u:107: satyāṃ pratyakṣe ca gṛhe tadabhāvaṃ pratipādayati spaṣṭo virodhaḥ,
GSP29vnyps42u:108: atastacchānyai bahirbhāvakalpanamarthāpattiḥ, iti; maivam, kvaciditi viditasya jīvanasya niyamābhāvāt, bahirvidyamānatāsaṃdehe niścayarūpeṇa gṛhābhāvapratyakṣeṇa pratispardhitumasāmarthyāt /
GSP29vnyps42u:109: na ca viruddhaviṣayayorvāstavaṃ kutrāpi samabalatvaṃ samasti;ubhayāprāmāṇye tu kathañcit syāt /
GSP29vnyps42u:111: yadā vaiṣamyagrahaḥ, tadā tata eva balābalasiddhau kimarthāpattyā sādhyam
GSP29vnyps42u:112: ataḥ kevalaniravakāśavirodhiviśeṣasannidhau sati sāvakāśaṃ sāmānyaṃ saṃkocayitavyamiti vyavasthā syāt /
GSP29vnyps42u:113: sāpi ca tathaiva vyāpteḥ, ityanumānaphalameva; anyathā virodhiviṣayatyāga ivāvirodhiviśeṣaparyavasānādāvapi mānāntarakḷptiḥ kiṃ na syāt ? /
GSP29vnyps42u:115: agniṃ vinānupapadyamānatvasvaya liṅgapratyakṣarūpapramāṇadvayavirodhasya ca vaktuṃ śakyatvāt
GSP29vnyps42u:116: dhūmo hi kāraṇabhūtaṃ vahnimākṣipati, pratikṣipati tu pratyakṣam, iti virodhe parvatārvāgbhāge vahniriti vyavasthākalpanasyārthāpattitvaṃ syāt /
GSP29vnyps42u:117: vyāptinirūpaṇamantareṇa gamakatā gamakasyaiva dharmāntarayogitayā gamyate ityādibhedāstvāśāmātrakalpitāḥ, iti /
GSP29vnyps42u:123: ityādiṣu upamānārthāpattiparigrahaḥ pratibhāti, tadapi pūrvapakṣapradeśagatatvānna siddhāntatvāya kalpate /
GSP29vnyps42u:126: abhāvātmanā tu grahaṇepi pratiyogismaraṇādisahakārisahitāni tānyeva pramāṇanīti na tadatiriktakalpanāvakāśaḥ
GSP29vnyps42u:127: ata eva hi prāgartajābhāvādivijñānamapi nirvyūḍham; dṛṣṭa eva hi
GSP29vnyps42u:128: deśakālādisaṃsargādiviśeṣaḥ paścāt pratiyogismaraṇādimataḥ puruṣasya tadabhāvātmanā dhiyamadhirohati, smartavyasya smaraṇābhāvādvā; tatra tadabhāvānumānam /
GSP29vnyps42u:129: evamatiriktābhāvapakṣepi nirmūlā pramāṇāntarakḷptiḥ; saghaṭaṃ bhūtalamitivat aghaṭaṃ bhūtalamityapi hyaparokṣā pratītiḥ; na
GSP29vnyps42u:136: aitihyaṃ tu pramāṇamūlaṃ cedāgamaḥ; tadābhāsamūlaṃ cet tadābhāsaḥ /
GSP29vnyps42u:143: ceṣṭā giro vā svīkāryāḥ parapratyāyanāya hi /
GSP29vnyps42u:150: aniyatamapi sahadṛṣṭyā smārakamiti na pṛthageṣṭavyam iti /
GSP29vnyps42u:151: lipyakṣareṣu tu ayaṃ gakāraḥ ayaṃ ghakāraḥ iti varṇātmanā jñānamapramāṇameva /
GSP29vnyps42u:157: yattu pratibhāyāmuktaṃ tattvaratnākare--- "nanu ca pratibhā kācid
GSP29vnyps42u:166: tasmāt patañjaliḥ prāha pratibhā ceti tāṃ pramām" //
GSP29vnyps42u:169: pratyakṣaparokṣarūpeṇa dvitvasyaiva yuktatvāt, iti cenna, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29vnyps42u:173: pramāṇadvitvamevaṃ te vada kiṃ vāna rocate //
GSP29vnyps42u:180: ato na tāvati dvaidhe sādhite vivadāmahe /
GSP29vnyps42u:193: iti ṣoḍhā vibhāge tu na vimanyāmahe vayam //
GSP29vnyps42u:199: nanu anenana kiṃ pramāṇacintākleśena ? avimṛśyāpi pramāṇavargamupalambhānvayavyatirekādivaśāt paśvādīnāmiva manuṣyādīnāmapi laukikeṣvartheṣu pravṛttinivṛttitatprayojanādikaṃ nirupadravaṃ sidhyati /
GSP29vnyps42u:200: alaukikeṣvapi tattadvidhāyakaistadanugrāhakaiśca kalpasūtrādibhiścaritārthadhiyāṃ kimanena piṣṭapeṣaṇādikalpena vṛthā vimarśeneti cet, maivam; avakāśoparodhāya tattvopaplavamicchatām aviparyāsasiddhyai ca viśodhyā mānayaddhatiḥ //
GSP29vnyps42u:206: śuddhānyāyaniṣevitā śrutiśiraḥśuddhāntasiddhāntinī bhadrāṇāṃ pratipādanāya bhajatu pratyakṣatāmakṣatām
GSP29vnyps42u:207: patyau nityarase samaṃ karuṇayā pātivratīṃ bibhratī sarvagranthivimocanī bhagavatī sā me samīcī kṛtiḥ //
GSP29vnyps42u:208: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau smṛtyadhyāye //
